title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
re looks uncertain. She will have a lot to process, as her newfound family recuperates at our camp.

If Shadowheart previously tuned away from Shar and chose to kill parents to free them:

Shadowheart decided to end her parents' suffering by putting them to rest and entrusting their spirits to the care of Selûne. Now they are at peace, and she is free of Shar's influence. Free of her past, she can choose her own path at last.

If Shadowheart previously tuned away from Shar and chose to save her
